column2: Enable the decisions to transfer a prisoner into the hands of another person.
Enable the decisions to transfer a prisoner into the hands of another person.
Select this prisoner to move to another person.
Deselect this prisoner to move to another person.
Give your selected prisoners over to this person.
My Liege, we have been given an offer to take control over an amount of prisoners. How should we respond?
Select this prisoner to request from another person.
Deselect this prisoner to request from another person.
Request your desired prisoner from this person.
My Liege, it has been requested of us to hand over a prisoner. How should we respond?
